subject: Sailboats and Sailing
organizations: Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court
lead_paragraph: The Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court refused to stay a lower court’s ruling that San Francisco’s Golden Gate Yacht Club is the challenger of record in the America’s Cup, according to the United States syndicate. Officials for Alinghi of Switzerland, the America’s Cup champion, were not available for comment following the late-afternoon ruling.
